title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama HTTP API for Rails & Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers threads using local Ollama models with rate-limiting.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n node to integrate Ollama prompts into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate and chat methods.
